scripts.hash: find index.ts -type f -print0 | sort -z | xargs -0 openssl dgst -sha256 | openssl dgst -sha256 > .hash
scripts.changed: touch .hash; mv .hash old.hash; npm run hash; cmp old.hash .hash >/dev/null 2>&1
scripts.quick-build: if npm run changed; then echo 'Skipping build'; else npm run build; fi; rm old.hash
scripts.open-errors: tsc | grep -p '^\S' | sed -e 's/(.*//' | sort | uniq | xargs code
